title: How Many Playing Modes Does Music Support?
answer:
Music supports five playing modes:   
 ƒÜ Shuffle is off (by default): play all audio files in a playlist in order and stop when all the   
 files have been played.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140925095538482001.png)  

Shuffle is on: play all audio files in a playlist in a random order and stop when all the   
 files have been played.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140925095552536001.png)  

Repeating all songs: play all audio files in a playlist in order, and repeat the playlist in   
 order after the last file is played.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140925095648252001.png)  

Repeating current song: play the current audio file repeatedly.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140925095704807001.png)  

Shuffle is on + Repeating all songs: play all audio files in a playlist in a random order,   
 and repeat the playlist in a random order after the last file is played.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140925095735245001.png)
